message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be a great asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I can only pay up to $10000 for it. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $10000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I can consider $16000 as a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
